ygData.subject: Re: Stein of Moggok Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I can answer my own question here. I found out from a GM that the stein is LORE/NO DROP. I have one in the bank that I bought about a month ago, and that s
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I can answer my own question here. I found out from a GM that the
stein is LORE/NO DROP. I have one in the bank that I bought about a
month ago, and that's why I couldn't complete the quest the other 2X.
I guess I will either try and sell the one I have or give it to
someone and complete the quest over and over again for the exp.

Wonder why there aren't more quests for Enchanters though, and why
there aren't ANY especially for Erudite Enchanters :(

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Enie" <dawn_marie@m...> wrote:
> First of all, I'd like to wish everyone a Happy Easter.
>
> Have a question. I did the Stein Quest twice today. Cast
Illusion:DE
> on my Lvl 14 Erudite Enchanter, and cast Alliance on Clurg. I
conned
> Clurg as Amiable both times. Both times I said "What special book",
> he replied, and I gave him the compodium. Then he said something
> like "You must have worked hard to get my book, I am indebted to
you.
> I don't like being indebted, so take this as payment". He didn't
give
> me anything; no PP, no stein. I petitioned the GM. Does anyone have
a
> clue as to what is going on?
